# Connection filter

# TL;DR

  1. Edit your Connection Filter in protection -> connection filter. Add our current IPs list: IPs

# Settings

  1. Access the current Microsoft 365 Exchange admin center.

    Exchange Admin Center (opens new window)

  2. Go to connection filter in menu: protection -> connection filter.

    Select your Default. Click Edit.

    Reference (opens new window)

  3. In connection filtering -> IP Allow list.

    Click +.

    Add our current IPs list: IPs.

  4. Click Save.

  5. Click Ok.

Last Updated: 5 months ago

⟵ Spam filter Menus ⟶
